thread.title: Cavaliers' J.R. Smith returns to lineup after missing nearly three months
thread.title_full: Cavaliers' J.R. Smith returns to lineup after missing nearly three months

title: Cavaliers' J.R. Smith returns to lineup after missing nearly three months
text:
— UNINTERRUPTED (@uninterrupted) March 9, 2017 
Smith, who had surgery on his broken right thumb in late December , hasn’t played since Cleveland’s win over the Bucks on Dec. 20. He’s averaging 8.6 points on 33.7 percent shooting from the field, including 36.2 percent on 3-pointers. 
The Cavaliers are 1-3 in March as they coast into the postseason. Most notably, Cleveland is in the bottom third of the NBA in defense this season, although the Cavs do boast a top-three offense. 0
